numberInput.2decimals: The amount should be a decimal with maximum two digits after comma

login.title: Log In

otp.label: Email confirmation
otp.description: We have just sent you an email with a confirmation code. Please enter the code below and confirm your email address.

errors.checkCredentials: Please check your email and password

login.signUp: Don't have an account yet? <bold>Sign up</bold>

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email address associated with your account and we will send you an email so you can recover your password.

toast.title: We have sent you an email
toast.description: To make sure that you are the owner of the email we have sent you an email. Open it and reset your password.

toast.title: Password successfully changed
toast.description: You have successfully changed your password. Use it to log in.

createAccount.title: Create an account

toast.title: Account created
toast.description: Your account has been created successfully

error.title: This email is already registered
error.description: Please use another email or log in with this one

createAccount.disclaimer: By registering, you agree to our <bold>Privacy Policy</bold> and <bold>Terms and Conditions</bold>

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to Fast Growing, the most efficient way to profitability and passive income through our trading strategies system.
home.profit-description: Take a look at the benefits that you could have achieved in recent months.

invest.title: Invest
invest.description: The amount invested will no longer available to withdrawal.
invest.bottomText: If the USDT invest is equivalent to 1 or more BTC, you will need to verify your identity with your National ID and an invoice showing your current residence.
invest.refundInformation: The amount refunded will be available for reinvestment purposes.
invest.refundBottomText: If the USDT refund is equivalent to 1 or more BTC, you will need to verify your identity with your National ID and an invoice showing your current residence.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: Add money from your Personal Wallet and use it to continue investing in cryptos:

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.description: The amount withdrawn will no longer be used for investment purposes.
withdraw.withdrawWarning: If the USDT withdrawal is equivalent to 1 or more BTC, you will need to verify your identity with your National ID and an invoice showing your current residence.
withdraw.success: We will check the USDT amount you have withdrawn and you will receive it back shortly.
withdraw.error: There was an error while sending the withdrawal request:
withdraw.addressError: The address is invalid. Please use a valid Tron address.

history.title: History
history.noTransactions: So far, you haven't made any transactions

kyc.title: Confirm identity
kyc.description: For security reasons, it is necessary to validate your identity if you are withdrawing more than 1.00 BTC per day.

documentPhoto.title: Photograph the front side of your document
documentPhoto.description: We will verify that the information you have entered is true.

invoice.title: Upload an invoice (jpg, pdf or png)
invoice.description: We will verify that the information you have entered is true.

documentPhoto.title: Photograph front side
documentPhoto.requestPermissions: We need your permission to show the camera.

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.description: Get benefits by referring friends and acquaintances by sharing the following link:
referrals.copyReferralId: Referral ID copied to the clipboard.
referrals.shareMessage: Use my Invitation Code to profit on the platform: {{referralId}}
referrals.rewardsDescription: Click to the level to see your referrals:

support.title: Support
support.description: If you have any questions or problems you can provide us with your phone number and we will contact you within 48 working hours.
support.contact: You can also write us an email if you prefer:

form.success: We have received your phone number. We will contact you soon.
form.error: There was an error while sending de phone number:

logout.title: Log out
logout.description: You can log out or delete your account. If you delete your account you will not be able to log in again and you will lose all your saved data.
logout.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

form.error: There was an error while updating the password:

selectPlan.title: Choose your plan
selectPlan.description: Select one of our plans and start getting benefits as soon as possible:

selectSubscription.title: Subscription
selectSubscription.description: Choose the type of subscription. You can make a monthly payment indefinitely or make a single payment, valid for the next two years:

deposit.title: USDT Deposit
deposit.description: Choose a network to obtain the deposit address:
deposit.label: Choose a network
deposit.copy-button: Copy Wallet ID to the clipboard
deposit.copy-info: Wallet ID copied to the clipboard.
deposit.info: If you transfer more than {{price}} USDT, the remaining money will be used for investment purposes.

secondScreen.info: Welcome to Fast Growing, the most efficient way to profitability and passive income through our trading strategies system.

toast.title: Activated plan
toast.description: We have successfully received your transfer, so your plan has just started.
